name: Red Hood (Imbalisko)
description:
Walk through a village were a murderer hides among the villagers. Will you be able to discover who the murderer is?

You'll have to explore a village in search of clues. Inspect the villagers and remember the suspicious villagers location. Choose wisely which suspicious villager to kill because you have only one chance...

CONTROLS:

-WASD to move.

-E to inspect a villager.

-Q kill a villager (Only from day two).

-P to pause game.

NOTE: Download the desktop version to play in higher quality.

Game developed for the Game Jam "Themed Horror Game Jam  #7", 2022.
